title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
pitch: Build the future of global recruitment technology with cutting-edge web applications that connect talent worldwide.
description:
## Mission

As a Senior Full Stack Engineer, you'll architect and build the core platform that powers global talent acquisition. You'll work with cutting-edge technologies to create seamless experiences for both job seekers and employers.

## Impact

- Lead the development of scalable web applications serving millions of users
- Mentor junior developers and contribute to technical decisions
- Build features that directly impact hiring success rates
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional user experiences

## Must-have

- 5+ years of experience with React, Node.js, and TypeScript
- Strong understanding of cloud platforms (AWS preferred)
- Experience with database design and optimization
- Proven track record of building scalable applications
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills

## Nice-to-have

- Experience with Next.js and modern React patterns
- Knowledge of microservices architecture
- Background in HR tech or recruitment platforms
- Contributions to open source projects

## Perks

- Competitive salary and equity package
- Flexible remote work arrangements
- Annual learning budget of $2,000
- Premium health, dental, and vision insurance
- 4 weeks PTO + public holidays

## Process

1. Application review (3-5 business days)
2. Initial phone screen with hiring manager (30 minutes)
3. Technical interview with senior engineers (90 minutes)
4. System design discussion (60 minutes)
5. Final interview with leadership team (45 minutes)
6. Reference checks and offer

title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning

description:
## Mission

- Build recommendation systems for candidate-job matching

## Must-have

- 3+ years of experience in machine learning and data science
- Proficiency in Python, SQL, and ML frameworks (TensorFlow/PyTorch)
- Experience with statistical modeling and hypothesis testing
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

## Nice-to-have

- Experience with natural language processing
- Knowledge of recommendation systems
- Background in HR analytics or people data
- Experience with cloud ML platforms (AWS SageMaker, GCP AI)

## Perks

- Competitive salary and equity
- Hybrid work model (2-3 days in office)
- Conference attendance and learning opportunities
- Top-tier equipment and development tools
- Health and wellness benefits

## Process

1. Application and portfolio review
2. Technical screening with data team lead
3. Case study presentation (take-home project)
4. Technical deep-dive with senior data scientists
5. Cultural fit interview with hiring manager
6. Final discussion with VP of Data
